text: María del Carmen Machi Arroyo, professionally known as Carmen Machi (born 7 January 1963) is a Spanish actress. She's mostly known for her role as Aída García in 7 vidas and Aída. She has also starred in Hable con ella (2002), Descongélate (2003), Los Amantes Pasajeros (2013), Ocho apellidos vascos (2014) and Ocho apellidos catalanes (2015). ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Spanish voice actors Category:Actors from Madrid
title: Carmen Machi
